deploy: echo 'Updating image tag on GitOps repo...'
yq -i e '.environments[0].image.tag = env(CONTAINER_TAG)| (... | select(tag == "!!merge")) tag = ""' values.yaml
if [[ -z $(git status -s) ]]; then echo "The container tags have already been updated to: $CONTAINER_TAG. Deployment skipped..." && exit 0; fi
